summary: Some Weapons For Nords Made in Valhala
descriptionHtml:
======================================================================================
====================Update For Yes Thor Swords Standalone version 1.8==================
=======================================================================================
======================Update__1.8========New Swords====20.01.2012=============

5.**Noble Claymore**______________2 Handed_____added 20.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
6.**Noble Sword**_________________1 Handed_____added 20.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
======================================================================================


=======================================================================================
====================Read this for Yes Thor Swords Standalone version 1.8===============
=======================================================================================


What this mod does:

You Get new swords

1.**Wolf Claymore**___________2 Handed_____added 18.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
3.**Wolf Sword**______________1 Handed_____added 18.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
3.**Wolf Great Scimitar**_____2 Handed_____added 18.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
4.**Wolf Scimitar**___________1 Handed_____added 18.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
5.**Wolf Great Katana**_______2 Handed_____added 19.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
6.**Wolf Katana**_____________1 Handed_____added 19.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
7.**Noble Claymore**__________2 Handed_____added 20.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge
8.**Noble Sword**_____________1 Handed_____added 20.01.2012___Steel Section to Forge

=============================================

Installation Instructions:

Download the file:

1.YesThorSwordsStandalone
====================================================================================
1. go to **(your user name)**\\Documents and Settings\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

open the SkyrimPrefs.ini with the notepad
and put this line under the [Launcher] section

bEnableFileSelection=1

2.Unpack the mod to a known location like (Desktop).

3.Find the folder labeled \'Data\' within the mods files.

Copy data folder to your Skyrim main folder where the TESV.exe is

When prompted by Windows if you would like to overwrite files with the same name
in the data folder located there answer, \"Yes To All\".

4.Start up Skyrim , and place a checkmark next to YesThorSwords.esp
in your Data files.

5.Visit a smith and forge  swords under the Steel section you will find

1.**Wolf Claymore**___________2 Handed
2.**Wolf Sword**______________1 Handed with Scabard
3.**Wolf Great Scimitar**_____2 Handed
4.**Wolf Scimitar**___________1 Handed with Scabard
5.**Wolf Great Katana**_______2 Handed
6.**Wolf Katana**_____________1 Handed with Scabard
7.**Noble Claymore**__________2 Handed
8.**Noble Sword**_____________1 Handed with Scabard


sword can be forged by the smith in next locations
Or you also can buy them by the smith

- Riverwood
- Whiterun
- Makarath
- Solitude
- Windhelm

Un-Installation Instructions:
______________________________

Remove the checkmark from YesThorSwords.esp in the
data files at start of the Skyrim launcher

If you would also like to remove the files

delate the folder WolfSwords and Noble Swords from the data\\meshes\\weapons\\YesThor
and the folders WolfSword ,WolfScimitar, WolfKatana and NobleSwords from the data\\textures\\weaponsYesThor
and the file YesThorSwords.esp from the data folder

Credits:
_________
****Adonnay**** for making these great swords.

I ****Cokla****
did some retextures and mesh mixing an import the swords to the Skyrim

Permission:  
----------------------
No permission from me nedded also ne credits, becouse i didnt make the swords
i just imported it to Skyrim.

but if you use any of the file or texture from these mod you must credit the autor
of the Adonnay
===================================================================================

Permissions from the autor of the AdonnayClassical_Weaponry  Mod for Oblivion.
[url=http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=9185]LINK TO ORIGINAL MOD[/url]

Masage at Nexus Forums
=================================
quote ******Cokla*****  To Adonnay


Hi.

These are real great swords you are making.

They would look real good in Skyrim.

Can you give me a permision to import them to the skyrim.

with full credits to you 
====================================================================

Quote *****Adonnay To Cokla******
======================================

Hey there,

Thanks. I think a simple port wouldn\'t be sufficient to make them look good in Skyrim. 
Most of the textures would probably need some tweaking (lighting is handled differently in Skyrim) 
and the blood meshes would have to be added (as far as I know). 
If you really want to do that, be my guest :)

Cheers
-Ad 
=========================================================================================
author: Cokla
